languages.text: "Я... понимаю. И выплачу тебе бладгельд за павших, Вольный Торговец. Смерть твоих воинов будет оплачена смертью твоих врагов".
"I... understand. And I will pay you a bloodgeld for the fallen, Rogue Trader. The deaths of your warriors will be paid for with the deaths of your enemies."
languages.original_text: "Я... понимаю. И выплачу тебе бладгельд за павших, Вольный Торговец. Смерть твоих воинов будет оплачена смертью твоих врагов".

traits.locale_text: "I... understand. And I will pay you a bloodgeld for the fallen, Rogue Trader. The deaths of your warriors will be paid for with the deaths of your enemies."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: “我……明白了，我愿意为那些死者支付血酬，行商浪人。我会杀死你所有的敌人，以此为你的战士们报仇。”
languages.original_text: "I... understand. And I will pay you a bloodgeld for the fallen, Rogue Trader. The deaths of your warriors will be paid for with the deaths of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: “我……明白了，我愿意为那些死者支付血酬，行商浪人。我会杀死你所有的敌人，以此为你的战士们报仇。”
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: 「それは…分かってる。戦死者の復讐で償わせてもらおう、自由開拓者よ。お前の戦士たちの死は、お前の敵の死で償う」
languages.original_text: "I... understand. And I will pay you a bloodgeld for the fallen, Rogue Trader. The deaths of your warriors will be paid for with the deaths of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: 「それは…分かってる。戦死者の復讐で償わせてもらおう、自由開拓者よ。お前の戦士たちの死は、お前の敵の死で償う」
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: «Lo... entiendo. Y pagaré el bloodgeld por los caídos, Comerciante Independiente. La muerte de sus guerreros se saldará con la de sus enemigos».
languages.original_text: "I... understand. And I will pay you a bloodgeld for the fallen, Rogue Trader. The deaths of your warriors will be paid for with the deaths of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: «Lo... entiendo. Y pagaré el bloodgeld por los caídos, Comerciante Independiente. La muerte de sus guerreros se saldará con la de sus enemigos».
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: « Je... comprends et je vous verserai le prix du sang pour les hommes que vous avez perdus, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. La mort de vos guerriers sera dédommagée par celle de vos ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "I... understand. And I will pay you a bloodgeld for the fallen, Rogue Trader. The deaths of your warriors will be paid for with the deaths of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: « Je... comprends et je vous verserai le prix du sang pour les hommes que vous avez perdus, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. La mort de vos guerriers sera dédommagée par celle de vos ennemis. »
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Ich ... verstehe. Und ich werde Euch ein Blutgeld für die Gefallenen bezahlen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Der Tod Eurer Krieger wird vergolten mit dem Tod Eurer Feinde."
languages.original_text: "I... understand. And I will pay you a bloodgeld for the fallen, Rogue Trader. The deaths of your warriors will be paid for with the deaths of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... verstehe. Und ich werde Euch ein Blutgeld für die Gefallenen bezahlen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Der Tod Eurer Krieger wird vergolten mit dem Tod Eurer Feinde."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Anlıyorum. Yitenlerin kan tazminatını ödeyeceğim Hür Tacir. Savaşçılarının ölümü, düşmanlarının ölümüyle karşılanacak."
languages.original_text: "I... understand. And I will pay you a bloodgeld for the fallen, Rogue Trader. The deaths of your warriors will be paid for with the deaths of your enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum. Düşenler için sana kan tazminatı vereceğim Hür Tacir. Savaşçılarının ölümü, düşmanlarının ölümüyle karşılanacak."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
